name: The Grig
description:
For the I Can't Draw (But Want To Make A Game) jam, this was an intense two week foray into learning Godot that has absolutely messed up my wrist again.

I cannot advise backtracking in any form: right now, all room scripts reset when you leave them and stuff breaks really easily. Luckily it's not a long game, nor does it require backtracking for anything but the easter egg in the coffin room, so it shouldn't affect your playthrough. Consider this your "you can, but be careful" warning. There are no ducks in this one!

I fully intend to go back and work on this again, just not with such feverish intensity as the jam provoked. But I will polish this turd until at least this first area is completely playable, and has some actual graphics, and then probably re-release it as a fresh project.
I'd still really appreciate it if you played and maybe left a comment! Bugs, errors, suggestions, Cheers!

CONTROLS
LEFT and RIGHT key to move
DOWN to crouch or drop down
SPACE to jump
1 to splash blood around
4 to interact with some things

~SPECIAL THANKS~
Pierre Miniggio and Spyridon Glarakis for lending their music
Nick's girlfriend for an excellent raptor screech
poobslag and zacryol for beginner-friendly code assists
Belladonna Bennett for invaluable design input
charlmes for hosting a great jam
-and everyone in the jam channel for being such solid company
